employee.schema: employee(id UUID, full_name VARCHAR(150), email VARCHAR(150), phone VARCHAR(15), date_of_joining DATE, department_id UUID, role_id UUID, manager_id UUID, team_lead_id UUID, is_active BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMP)

salary.schema: salary(id UUID, employee_id UUID, month_year DATE, basic_salary NUMERIC(10, 2), hra NUMERIC(10, 2), other_allowances NUMERIC(10, 2), deductions NUMERIC(10, 2), net_salary NUMERIC(10, 2), paid_on DATE)

project.schema: project(id UUID, name VARCHAR(200), description TEXT, started_at DATE, ended_at DATE)

employeeproject.schema: employeeproject(id UUID, employee_id UUID, project_id UUID, role VARCHAR(100), start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
